title: Coinbase to Bring TradFi Assets On-Chain With New Platform Built on Base Under Abu Dhabi Regulator's Oversight
description: Coinbase's Project Diamond lets institutions create and trade digital native versions of financial instruments such as debt using Base in a regulated manner.

title: 'Take some rest and GO' — Bitcoin price copies 2020 bull run fractal
description:
Bitcoin is nowhere near done with its bull market, should a chart fractal from several years ago continue to play out.

Bitcoin (BTC) should not worry traders after the biggest one-day drop of 2023 if one chart fractal plays out.

In a post on X (formerly Twitter) on Dec. 12, popular trader Alan Tardigrade revealed uncanny similarities between Bitcoin now and four years ago.

Bitcoin may be struggling to clear key long-term resistance, but one comparison suggests that it is “business as usual” for BTC price action.

Read more

title: Coinbase co-founder Fred Ehrsam sells $13 million COIN shares as ARK continues to divest
description:
Major Coinbase shareholders have sold over $14 million of stocks over the past 48 hours.

According to public trading data, Coinbase co-founder Fred Ehrsam and ARK Invest have sold more than $14 million of Coinbase shares over the past 48 hours.

Information shared by Insider Tracker, a service that shares trading information of high-profile company executives and politicians shows that Ehrsam sold 97.836 COIN shares for $13.2 million on Dec. 11.

Meanwhile, ARK Invest’s daily trade information newsletter, which provides updates on its actively managed exchange-traded funds (ETFs), showed that its ARK Innovation ETF (ARKK) had offloaded some 10,933 COIN shares valued at around $1.5 million.

Read more

title: CFTC chair says most cryptocurrencies are commodities under current laws
description:
Commodities Futures Trading Commission (CFTC) Chairman Rostin Behnam believes that most cryptocurrencies are commodities under existing laws, which need to be updated to account for technological advances. Behnam made the statement during an interview on CNBC’s Squawk Box on Dec. 12. The CFTC chair said there is an urgent need for more comprehensive regulatory frameworks […]

The post CFTC chair says most cryptocurrencies are commodities under current laws appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Bit Origin Secures $6.74 Million for New Bitcoin Mining Facility in Wyoming
description: Bitcoin mining firm Bit Origin has announced that the company has secured a $6.74 million investment to build a new mining facility in Cheyenne, Wyoming. The data center will be a new 25-megawatt (MW) site that aims to accommodate between 4,480 to 8,400 bitcoin miners. Ahead of Bitcoin Halving, Bit Origin Announces Major Investment in […]

title: U.S Dollar Collapse, Fed Money Printing Set To Trigger Ripple (XRP), Solana and Everlodge Surge
description: As federal money printing continues to inflate the dollar, experts believe that cryptocurrency could be a strong alternative. The crypto market has boomed throughout the last quarter, with projects like Rippe (XRP), Solana, and Everlodge gaining momentum. Now, as the U.S. dollar continues to lose value, all three projects could surge in value. Everlodge Hits [...]

title: OverProtocol Announces Open Beta Testnet and Community Incentives for Participation
description: Seoul, South Korea, December 12th, 2023, Chainwire OverProtocol, a Layer 1 blockchain focused on democratizing validation, has exciting plans for the next year, including a mainnet launch in the first half. In October, the project successfully completed a closed beta testnet with 15,000 applicants from 127 countries, of whom 1,300 completed all tests. In preparation [...]

title: China’s Blockchain ID Revolution: RealDID for 1.4 Billion Citizens
description:
Led by China’s Ministry of Public Security in collaboration with BSN, the RealDID initiative is a pioneering effort to harness the power of blockchain for secure and efficient identity verification. This marks a significant stride towards the integration of blockchain into critical government functions. RealDID: China’s Blockchain Identity Gamechanger for 1.4 Billion The core concept […]

The post China’s Blockchain ID Revolution: RealDID for 1.4 Billion Citizens appeared first on Altcoin Buzz.

title: NFTs May Not Perform as Expected During the Next Bull Cycle
description:
In an X post shared earlier today, the head of research at K33 Research, Anders Helseth, cautioned people to steer clear of NFTs during the next bull cycle. Helseth pointed out that in previous bull cycles, Bitcoin (BTC) performed well initially, after which altcoins started to shine as the bull market gained more momentum. The […]

The post NFTs May Not Perform as Expected During the Next Bull Cycle appeared first on Coin Edition.
